message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $80 to me. Considering its quality and unique features, I would like to propose a price of $120 for it. I believe this offers a fair deal for both of us. Let me know if you're interested or if you have any questions.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to pay $95 for it, considering my budget constraints. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
